data.name: RPG Maker MV - Tales of the Far East
data.detailed_description:
Feel yourself get carried away to the exotic locations of the Far East.

Tales of the Far East is filled with themes that are both inspiring and useful. From the busy markets in the heart of the desert to the quiet solitude of beautiful bamboo groves, each song is a melodious journey that invokes emotion. The use of traditional instruments brings an air of authenticity to each piece, while keeping it current and ready for use in your projects.

THIS PACK CONTAINS:

  • 15 music themes
  • Authentic traditional instruments and melodies
  • Quality compositions, using a variety of instruments and sounds
  • m4a and ogg formats included
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker MV projects

Tracklist:

1 - Aboriginal
2 - Ancient Traditions
3 - Asian Market
4 - Deserted Cities
5 - Distant Shores
6 - Eastern Winds
7 - Echoes in the Wind
8 - Mysterious
9 - Mysterious 2
10 - Peace and Resolve
11 - Sanctuary
12 - Sea of Sand
13 - The Market
14 - The Middle Kingdom
15 - Traveling

data.short_description: Explore the exotic sounds of musical themes inspired by the Far East.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Tales of the Far East
